articles.title: American and Russians dock at International Space Station - The Irish News
articles.description: The launch came three days before the 60th anniversary of the first human flight to space by Soviet cosmonaut Yuri Gagarin.
articles.content:
A trio of Russian and American space travellers have launched successfully and reached the International Space Station.
